mapper.select: SELECT WCV.CITY_ID AS ID, WCV.CITY_NAME AS NAME, WCV.CONTINENT, WCV.COUNTRY_NAME AS NATION, WCV.DISTRICT, WCV.POPULATION FROM WORLD_CITY_VIEW WCV OFFSET #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS ONLY

SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNO, WCV.CITY_ID AS ID, WCV.CITY_NAME AS NAME, WCV.CONTINENT, WCV.COUNTRY_NAME AS NATION, WCV.DISTRICT, WCV.POPULATION FROM WORLD_CITY_VIEW WCV WHERE WCV.COUNTRY_NAME = #{nation,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} OFFSET #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM WORLD_CITY_VIEW WCV WHERE WCV.COUNTRY_NAME = #{nation,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}

SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNO, WCV.CITY_ID AS ID, WCV.CITY_NAME AS NAME, WCV.CONTINENT, WCV.COUNTRY_NAME AS NATION, WCV.DISTRICT, WCV.POPULATION FROM WORLD_CITY_VIEW WCV WHERE WCV.CITY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, '%')) OFFSET #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM WORLD_CITY_VIEW WCV WHERE WCV.CITY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, '%'))
SELECT WCV.CITY_ID AS ID, WCV.CITY_NAME AS NAME, WCV.CONTINENT, WCV.COUNTRY_NAME AS NATION, WCV.DISTRICT, WCV.POPULATION FROM WORLD_CITY_VIEW WCV ORDER BY WCV.POPULATION ASC FETCH FIRST 15 ROWS ONLY
SELECT WCV.CITY_ID AS ID, WCV.CITY_NAME AS NAME, WCV.CONTINENT, WCV.COUNTRY_NAME AS NATION, WCV.DISTRICT, WCV.POPULATION FROM WORLD_CITY_VIEW WCV ORDER BY WCV.POPULATION DESC FETCH FIRST 15 ROWS ONLY
SELECT WCV.CITY_ID AS ID, WCV.CITY_NAME AS NAME, WCV.CONTINENT, WCV.COUNTRY_NAME AS NATION, WCV.DISTRICT, WCV.POPULATION FROM WORLD_CITY_VIEW WCV WHERE WCV.CITY_ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
